mapper.select:
SELECT SAL.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM, SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID ,(SELECT CU.CUST_ID FROM CUSTOMER CU WHERE CU.CUST_ID = SA.CUST_ID) CUST_ID ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ATC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD) SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD ,TO_CHAR(SA.STRT_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_D ,SA.STRT_T ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 1, 2) STRT_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 4, 5) STRT_T_M ,TO_CHAR(SA.END_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') END_D ,SA.END_T ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 1, 2) END_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 4, 5) END_T_M ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ASC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD)SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD ,SALES_ACTVY_LOC ,SALES_ACTVY_PERSON ,SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT ,SALES_ACTVY_REASON ,SA.FST_REG_ID ,SA.FIN_MDFY_ID ,TO_CHAR(SA.FST_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') FST_REG_DT ,SO.SALES_OPPT_NM FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA, SALES_OPPORTUNITY SO WHERE SA.SALES_OPPT_ID=SO.SALES_OPPT_ID(+) AND SA.ACT_YN = 'Y'
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1})
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0})
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1})
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1})
AND SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt}
AND SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0}
AND SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1}
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1})
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0})
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1})
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1})
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select}
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0}
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1}
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%')
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%')
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%')
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%')
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%'
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%'
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%'
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%')
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%')
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%')
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%')
AND SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%'
AND SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%'
AND SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%'
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%')
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%')
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%')
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%')
AND SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%'
AND SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%'
AND SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%'
ORDER BY SA.FIN_MDFY_DT DESC ) P ) SAL WHERE SAL.RNUM>=#{page.startRow} and SAL.RNUM<=#{page.endRow}

SELECT SAL.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM, SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID ,(SELECT CU.CUST_ID FROM CUSTOMER CU WHERE CU.CUST_ID = SA.CUST_ID) CUST_ID ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ATC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD) SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD ,TO_CHAR(SA.STRT_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_D ,SA.STRT_T ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 1, 2) STRT_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 4, 5) STRT_T_M ,TO_CHAR(SA.END_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') END_D ,SA.END_T ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 1, 2) END_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 4, 5) END_T_M ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ASC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD)SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD ,SALES_ACTVY_LOC ,SALES_ACTVY_PERSON ,SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT ,SALES_ACTVY_REASON ,SA.FST_REG_ID ,SA.FIN_MDFY_ID ,TO_CHAR(SA.FIN_MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') FIN_MDFY_DT ,SO.SALES_OPPT_NM FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA, SALES_OPPORTUNITY SO WHERE SA.SALES_OPPT_ID=SO.SALES_OPPT_ID(+) AND SA.ACT_YN = 'N'
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1})
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0})
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1})
AND (SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0} OR SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1})
AND SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt}
AND SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt0}
AND SA.STRT_D = #{ssale_actvy_strt1}
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1})
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0})
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1})
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0} OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1})
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select}
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select0}
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sactvy_type_select1}
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%')
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%')
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%')
AND (SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%' OR SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%')
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm} || '%'
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm0} || '%'
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%' || #{ssales_actvy_nm1} || '%'
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%')
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%')
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%')
AND (SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%' OR SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%')
AND SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm} || '%'
AND SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm0} || '%'
AND SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%' || #{ssales_oppt_nm1} || '%'
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%')
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%')
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%')
AND (SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%' OR SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%')
AND SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id}||'%'
AND SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id0}||'%'
AND SA.CUST_ID like '%'||#{scust_id1}||'%'
ORDER BY SA.FIN_MDFY_DT DESC ) P ) SAL WHERE SAL.RNUM>=#{page.startRow} and SAL.RNUM<=#{page.endRow}

SELECT SAL.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM, SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ATC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD) SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD ,TO_CHAR(SA.STRT_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_D ,SA.STRT_T ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 1, 2) STRT_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 4, 5) STRT_T_M ,TO_CHAR(SA.END_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') END_D ,SA.END_T ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 1, 2) END_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 4, 5) END_T_M ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ASC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD)SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD ,SALES_ACTVY_LOC ,SALES_ACTVY_PERSON ,SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT ,SALES_ACTVY_REASON ,SA.FST_REG_ID ,SA.FIN_MDFY_ID ,TO_CHAR(SA.FST_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') FST_REG_DT ,SO.SALES_OPPT_NM FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA, SALES_OPPORTUNITY SO WHERE SA.SALES_OPPT_ID=SO.SALES_OPPT_ID(+) AND SA.ACT_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SA.FST_REG_DT DESC ) P ) SAL

select a.sales_actvy_nm , TO_CHAR (a.strt_d , 'YYYY-MM-DD') strt_d , TO_CHAR (a.end_d , 'YYYY-MM-DD') end_d , b.cust_nm from sales_activity a, customer b where 1=1 and a.cust_id=b.cust_id and sysdate BETWEEN a.strt_d and a.end_d+ 0.99999

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA, SALES_OPPORTUNITY SO WHERE SA.SALES_OPPT_ID=SO.SALES_OPPT_ID(+) AND SA.ACT_YN = 'Y'
AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM like '%'||#{ssales_actvy_nm}||'%'
AND SO.SALES_OPPT_NM like '%'||#{sact_oppt_nm}||'%'
AND SA.STRT_D=TO_DATE(#{sstart_day},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD like '%'||#{ssales_actvy_stat_cd}||'%'
SELECT CODE sales_actvy_type_cd, CD_NM sales_actvy_type_nm FROM CODE WHERE CD_GRP_ID='ATC'
SELECT CODE sales_actvy_stat_cd, CD_NM sales_actvy_stat_nm FROM CODE WHERE CD_GRP_ID='ASC'

SELECT S.SALES_OPPT_ID, S.SALES_OPPT_NM, (SELECT C.CD_NM FROM CODE C WHERE C.CD_GRP_ID='OTL' AND C.CODE = S.SALES_LEV_CD) SALES_LEV_CD, (SELECT C.CD_NM FROM CODE C WHERE C.CD_GRP_ID='OSC' AND C.CODE = S.SALES_OPPT_STAT_CD ) SALES_OPPT_STAT_CD, S.EXPT_SALES_AMT, S.EXPT_FIN_D, S.PSBLTY_RATE FROM SALES_OPPORTUNITY S, CUSTOMER C WHERE S.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND S.ACT_YN = 'Y' AND S.SALES_OPPT_STAT_CD = '0001'
ORDER BY SALES_OPPT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT CT.CUST_ID ,CT.CUST_NM ,(SELECT e.CD_NM FROM CODE e WHERE e.CD_GRP_ID='CDC' AND e.CODE = CT.CUST_DIV_CD) CUST_DIV_CD ,(SELECT e.CD_NM FROM CODE e WHERE e.CD_GRP_ID='CCS' AND e.CODE = CT.BIZ_STATUS) BIZ_STATUS FROM CUSTOMER CT WHERE CT.ACT_YN='Y'
ORDER BY CT.CUST_ID

SELECT SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM ,SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD ,TO_CHAR(SA.STRT_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_D ,SA.STRT_T ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 1, 2) STRT_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 4, 5) STRT_T_M ,TO_CHAR(SA.END_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') END_D ,SA.END_T ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 1, 2) END_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 4, 5) END_T_M ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_LOC ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_PERSON ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_REASON ,SA.FST_REG_ID ,SA.FIN_MDFY_ID ,TO_CHAR(SA.FST_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') FST_REG_DT ,SO.SALES_OPPT_ID ,SO.SALES_OPPT_NM ,C.CUST_ID ,C.CUST_NM FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA, SALES_OPPORTUNITY SO, CUSTOMER C WHERE SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID = #{sales_actvy_id} AND SA.SALES_OPPT_ID=SO.SALES_OPPT_ID(+) AND SA.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID(+) AND SA.ACT_YN = 'Y'

SELECT SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM ,SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD ,TO_CHAR(SA.STRT_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_D ,SA.STRT_T ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 1, 2) STRT_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 4, 5) STRT_T_M ,TO_CHAR(SA.END_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') END_D ,SA.SA.END_T ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 1, 2) END_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 4, 5) END_T_M ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_LOC ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_PERSON ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_REASON ,SA.FST_REG_ID ,SA.FIN_MDFY_ID ,TO_CHAR(SA.FST_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') FST_REG_DT FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA WHERE SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID = #{sales_actvy_id} AND SA.ACT_YN = 'Y'

SELECT SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM ,SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD ,TO_CHAR(SA.STRT_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_D ,SA.STRT_T ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 1, 2) STRT_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.STRT_T, 4, 5) STRT_T_M ,TO_CHAR(SA.END_D ,'YYYY-MM-DD') END_D ,SA.END_T ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 1, 2) END_T_H ,SUBSTR(SA.END_T, 4, 5) END_T_M ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_LOC ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_PERSON ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_REASON ,SA.FST_REG_ID ,SA.FIN_MDFY_ID ,TO_CHAR(SA.FST_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') FST_REG_DT ,SO.SALES_OPPT_ID ,SO.SALES_OPPT_NM ,C.CUST_ID ,C.CUST_NM FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA, SALES_OPPORTUNITY SO, CUSTOMER C WHERE SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID = #{sales_actvy_id} AND SA.SALES_OPPT_ID=SO.SALES_OPPT_ID(+) AND SA.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID(+) AND SA.ACT_YN = 'N'
SELECT * FROM SALES_ACTIVITY WHERE TO_CAHR(STRT_D, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ACT_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update:
INSERT INTO SALES_ACTIVITY( SALES_ACTVY_ID, SALES_ACTVY_NM, SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD, SALES_OPPT_ID, CUST_ID, SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD, STRT_D, STRT_T, END_D, END_T, SALES_ACTVY_LOC, SALES_ACTVY_PERSON, SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT, SALES_ACTVY_REASON, FST_REG_ID)
VALUES( (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(SALES_ACTIVITY PK_SALES_ACTIVITY)*/ DECODE(MAX(SALES_ACTVY_ID), NULL, 'SAT0000001', 'SAT' || lpad( (SUBSTR( MAX( SALES_ACTVY_ID ), 4, 7 ) + 1), 7, 0)) SALES_ACTVY_ID FROM SALES_ACTIVITY WHERE ROWNUM=1), #{sales_actvy_nm}, #{sales_actvy_type_cd}, #{sales_oppt_id}, #{cust_id}, #{sales_actvy_stat_cd}, TO_DATE(#{strt_d},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{strt_t}, TO_DATE(#{end_d},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{end_t}, #{sales_actvy_loc}, #{sales_actvy_person}, #{sales_actvy_content}, #{sales_actvy_reason}, #{fst_reg_id} )

UPDATE SALES_ACTIVITY SET SALES_ACTVY_NM = #{sales_actvy_nm}, SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD = #{sales_actvy_type_cd}, SALES_OPPT_ID = #{sales_oppt_id}, CUST_ID = #{cust_id}, SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD = #{sales_actvy_stat_cd}, STRT_D = TO_DATE(#{strt_d}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), STRT_T = #{strt_t}, END_D = TO_DATE(#{end_d}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), END_T = #{end_t}, SALES_ACTVY_LOC = #{sales_actvy_loc}, SALES_ACTVY_PERSON = #{sales_actvy_person}, SALES_ACTVY_CONTENT = #{sales_actvy_content}, SALES_ACTVY_REASON = #{sales_actvy_reason}, FIN_MDFY_ID = #{fin_mdfy_id}, FIN_MDFY_DT = sysdate WHERE SALES_ACTVY_ID = #{sales_actvy_id}
mapper.select:
select d.*, r from ( select rownum r, a.sales_oppt_id, a.cust_id, c.cust_nm, a.sales_oppt_nm, (select cd_nm from code where cd_grp_id='OTL' and code = a.sales_lev_cd) sales_lev_cd_nm, a.sales_lev_cd, a.sales_oppt_stat_cd, a.expt_sales_amt,
case when ((to_char(a.expt_fin_d,'yyyy-mm-dd'))) is null then '-' else ( to_char(a.expt_fin_d,'yyyy-mm-dd')) end as expt_fin_d ,
a.psblty_rate, (select cd_nm from code where cd_grp_id='OSC' and code = a.sales_oppt_stat_cd) sales_oppt_stat_cd_nm, a.memo, a.fst_reg_id,
case when ((to_char(a.fst_reg_dt ,'yyyy-mm-dd'))) is null then '-' else ( to_char(a.fst_reg_dt ,'yyyy-mm-dd')) end as fst_reg_dt ,
a.fin_mdfy_id, a.fin_mdfy_dt, a.act_yn from sales_opportunity a, customer c where 1=1 and a.cust_id = c.cust_id and a.act_yn='Y' order by a.FIN_MDFY_DT desc )d where d.cust_id = #{cust_id} and act_yn='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE sales_opportunity SET SALES_OPPT_NM = #{sales_oppt_nm}, SALES_OPPT_STAT_CD = #{sales_oppt_stat_cd}, SALES_LEV_CD = #{sales_lev_cd}, EXPT_FIN_D = #{expt_fin_d}, PSBLTY_RATE = #{psblty_rate}, MEMO = #{memo} WHERE SALES_OPPT_ID = #{sales_oppt_id}
mapper.select: select ing.ing as "진행중", defer.defer as "보류", schedule.sche as "예정", compl.cplt as "완료" from (select count(*) as ing from SALES_ACTIVITY a where 1=1 and a.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD = '0001' and a.act_yn='Y') ing, (select count(*) defer from SALES_ACTIVITY a where 1=1 and a.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD = '0002' and a.act_yn='Y') defer, (select count(*) as sche from SALES_ACTIVITY a where 1=1 and a.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD = '0003' and a.act_yn='Y') schedule, (select count(*) as cplt from SALES_ACTIVITY a where 1=1 and a.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD = '0004' and a.act_yn='Y') compl

SELECT SA.SALES_ACTVY_NM ,SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ATC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD) SALES_ACTVY_TYPE_CD ,SA.STRT_D ,SA.STRT_T, SA.END_D, SA.END_T ,(SELECT C.cd_nm FROM code C WHERE C.cd_grp_id = 'ASC' AND C.code = SA.SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD) SALES_ACTVY_STAT_CD ,SA.FST_REG_ID ,SA.FIN_MDFY_ID, SA.FST_REG_DT ,SO.SALES_OPPT_NM FROM SALES_ACTIVITY SA, SALES_OPPORTUNITY SO WHERE SA.SALES_OPPT_ID=SO.SALES_OPPT_ID(+) AND SA.SALES_ACTVY_ID = #{sales_actvy_id} AND SA.ACT_YN = 'Y'
SELECT CODE sales_actvy_div_cd, CD_NM sales_actvy_div_nm FROM CODE WHERE CD_GRP_ID='ADC'
